product_name: Black Diamond CoEfficient Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a slim, body-hugging fit that makes it an ideal addition to your alpine layering system, the CoEfficient Jacket provides quick-drying insulation without weighing you down.
short_description: With a slim, body-hugging fit that makes it an ideal addition to your alpine layering system, the CoEfficient Jacket provides quick-drying insulation without weighing you down.
